QuestData.Title: All Natural
QuestData.Description: Oh, you have a trading post?$B$BFantastic!$B$BLet's make a deal. You help me power up my laser cannon, and I'll trade some of this... thermo... ultra... obsidiglass with you for some weapons.$B$BThe ancients all around here are practically made of charcoal after the arakkoa weapon hit, you should go get some of that!
